full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): NO TITLE [@004A *, ,CHEN GSER GYI SA GZHI LA THUG GI BAR ME'I RVA GUR GYIS 'GENGS PA, PHYAG GA-YAS KYI DANG POS RDO RJE, GNYIS PA NA 'PHAN RTZE GSUM PAS MTSAN PA'I KHA TAm GA ,GSUM PA NA RAL GRI,]
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @024A *, ,(CES RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI SGO NAS RAB GNAS BYED TSUL BYIN RLABS KYI ROL MTSO ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI RAB GNAS KYI DU MA DANG, DAM PA'I PHYAG BZHES MTHONG BRGYUD BZHIN, RANG GZHAN LA PHAN 'DOD KYI BSAM PAS BTZUN GZUGS, ^ DHARMA BADZRA GYIS, 'PHAR BZHES PA LCANG MO GLANG GI LO DBYAR DUS KYI DGA' MA LANG TSO DAR LA BABS PAR, SKYED MOS TSAL GYI BSTE GNAS YID DGA' CHOS 'PHEL DU @024B SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI AOR DU SU DGE SLONG BLO BZANG KUN DGA' BGYIS PAS SARBA DZA YANTU, ,)
